title: Enhancing thermophilic methane production from oil palm empty fruit bunches through various pretreatment methods: A comparative study
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Sittikorn Saelor, Prawit Kongjan, Poonsuk Prasertsan, Chonticha Mamimin, Sompong O-Thong
